name.baseName: Aluminium hydroxide/oxide nanoparticles adsorption (Electrolysis; prepeard; in water)
氢氧化铝/氧化物纳米颗粒吸附（电解；预制；湿）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: An adsorbent is a solid substance that attracts and holds on its surface molecules of gases or solutions with which it is in contact. It is used to adsorb gases or dissolved substances, and the process is known as adsorption. Adsorbents are characterized by their large surface area, pore structure, and high degree of surface reactivity, which make them suitable for applications such as cleaning, dechlorinating, deodorizing, and decolorizing both liquid and vapour applications. The efficiency of an adsorbent in removing contaminants is influenced by its concentration and porosity. AHNP was prepared by electro dissolution of aluminum electrodes in distilled water at the current density of 195 A/m2 . The electrolysis process continued for 2 h, after which electrolysis was stopped, and nanoparticles of aluminum hydroxide were allowed to settle at the bottom of the electrochemical reactor.

吸附剂是一种固体物质，其表面吸附并保持与其接触的气体或溶液分子。它被用来吸附气体或溶解物质，这个过程被称为吸附。吸附剂的特点是其大的表面积、孔结构和高度的表面反应性，这使其适用于清洁、脱氯、除臭和液体和蒸汽脱色等应用。吸附剂去除污染物的效率受其浓度和孔隙率的影响。AHNP是通过在电流密度为195A/m2的蒸馏水中电溶解铝电极来制备的。电解过程持续2小时，之后停止电解，并使氢氧化铝的纳米颗粒沉淀在电化学反应器的底部。
